description.value:
Prerequisite: Dexterity 13

Benefit: While wielding a melee weapon in each hand, you gain a +1 bonus to the damage rolls of weapon attacks that you make with a melee weapon.

Update (8/5/2010)

Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 319, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 320.
